TextView.android:text:
1. Data Collection
This app does NOT collect, transmit, or share any user data. All data (transactions and logs) is stored 100% locally on your specific device.

2. Internet Usage
This app does not use the Internet. It functions completely offline.

3. Third-Party Services
No third-party analytics, tracking, or advertising SDKs are present in this application.

4. Data Security
Your financial logs are stored in a secure local database (SQLite/Room) on your phone. If you uninstall the app, this data is permanently deleted by the Android OS.

5. Contact
Since we do not collect data, we do not have access to your personal information.
